item.title: AI-Based GPS Without Satellites: The Future Of Navigation
item.description: AI-based earthbound navigation can outsmart satellites using existing sensors, securing critical systems against cyberattacks.

item.title: Okay AI, Solo Kagent Is An Agentic AI Framework For Kubernetes
item.description: Newly created this year, kagent is an open source framework that provides application development tools, AI agents and related resources.
